author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Nagamalai Pudukottai police have registered a case against a Tangedco official and his wife on a complaint from an engineering graduate here on Saturday. According to rural police, Karadiappan’s son Ramesh Kumar (26) was seeking employment in Tangedco.

He had come in contact with Raja, working with the Tangedco in the city. He promised to get a job and demanded a total of Rs.18 lakh for the same. Last August, Ramesh Kumar had reportedly given Rs. seven lakh as an instalment along with his original degree certificates among others. He neither got a job nor the money back. When he went to Raja’s house, he and his wife Manimegalai had allegedly abused and threatened Ramesh Kumar and his father, he said in a complaint. Further investigation is on.
title: Case against Tangedco official, his wife
